price: (Yemwe bantu) ukuremwa kwanyu ndetse no kuzurwa kwanyu mwese (byoroshye nko kurema no kuzura) umuntu umwe. Mu by’ukuri Allah ni Uwumva cyane, Ubona bihebuje.
arabic: مَّا خَلۡقُكُمۡ وَلَا بَعۡثُكُمۡ إِلَّا كَنَفۡسٖ وَٰحِدَةٍۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعُۢ بَصِيرٌ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: mā khalqukum walā baʿthukum illā kanafsin wāḥidatin inna al-laha samīʿun baṣīrun
